body.p:
Barbourvill Ky Jan 21st 1861
Mr John Word
Dear Sir

Enclosed your will find a petition to the Gov for a remit of a fine against John and Iaace Walter for the sum of ten dollars each you can see in the pertition the cause of it John I am the securty to the replvein ^^ Bond and will have it to pay if the Gov do not remit the same I want you to do all you can to keep me from having it to pay and if the Gov will not remit it get him to respite it as longe as you can

P. S.
your Family is all well D. G. Pouger is difficult about well
